unnormalised: Hey everyone, any news on Bumrah? Hope he's recovered from that injury. Last I heard, he was doing rehab at the NCA, Bangalore. Any update on his chances for the match on 26/01/2024? What about Hardik? He's crucial for the team's balance, especially with the World Cup coming up. Any word from BCCI after 17:00 hrs yesterday? Fingers crossed for good news before 15/08! Jai Hind!
normalised: Hey everyone, any news on Bumrah? Hope he's recovered from that injury. Last I heard, he was doing rehab at the N C A, Bangalore. Any update on his chances for the match on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty four? What about Hardik? He's crucial for the team's balance, especially with the World Cup coming up. Any word from B C C I after five zero zero P M yesterday? Fingers crossed for good news before fifteenth August! Jai Hind!
